${ModID}:Adderall.NAME: Adderall
${ModID}:Adderall.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Apply !M! Scaling Vigor and !M! Scaling Block. NL Each subsequent Attack this turn gains +2 additional Vigor, and each Skill gains +2 additional Block.
${ModID}:Adderall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Reduce cost. Increase the scaling effect for both Vigor and Block by !M!.

${ModID}:Concentration.NAME: Concentration
${ModID}:Concentration.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity. NL Exhaust
${ModID}:Concentration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:CreativeMind.NAME: Creative Mind
${ModID}:CreativeMind.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times. NL Gain X{!M!|>0=+!M!} Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
${ModID}:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Weak. NL Apply 1 Slow. NL Exhaust
${ModID}:Exploit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL Apply 2 Weak. NL Apply 1 Slow. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:Flail.NAME: Flail
${ModID}:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Just start swinging! Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:HyperFocus.NAME: Hyper Focus
${ModID}:HyperFocus.DESCRIPTION: Gain +1 stat - Pick one: NL Convert all new Strength or Dexterity into one stat for 3 Turns.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add 1 Strength. NL Apply Strength Fixation.
Add 1 Dexterity. NL Apply Dexterity Fixation.

${ModID}:HyperFocusDexterity.NAME: Hyper Focus
${ModID}:HyperFocusDexterity.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Gain +1 Dexterity NL Convert all new Strength into Dexterity for 3 Turns.

${ModID}:HyperFocusStrength.NAME: Hyper Focus
${ModID}:HyperFocusStrength.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Gain +1 Strength NL Convert all new Dexterity into Strength for 3 Turns.

${ModID}:HyperKick.NAME: Hyper Kick
${ModID}:HyperKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Exhaust a card.
${ModID}:HyperKick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Exhaust a card.

${ModID}:HyperVigilance.NAME: Hyper Vigilance
${ModID}:HyperVigilance.DESCRIPTION: Prepare for anything! NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Gain 1 Artifact. NL Exhaust
${ModID}:HyperVigilance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prepare for anything! NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Gain 1 Artifact. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:InertiaBlock.NAME: Inertia:Block
${ModID}:InertiaBlock.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Apply !M! Scaling Block. NL Each subsequent Skill gains +!M! additional Block.
${ModID}:InertiaBlock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Apply !M! Scaling Block. NL Each subsequent Skill gains +!M! additional Block.

${ModID}:InertiaVigor.NAME: Inertia:Vigor
${ModID}:InertiaVigor.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Apply !M! Scaling Vigor. NL Each subsequent Skill gains +!M! additional Vigor.
${ModID}:InertiaVigor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Apply !M! Scaling Vigor. NL Each subsequent Skill gains +!M! additional Vigor.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Shuffle *Smite{!Upgrades!|>0=+} and *Safety{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Multitask.NAME: Multitask
${ModID}:Multitask.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile and the top card of your discard pile. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:Ping.NAME: Ping
${ModID}:Ping.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card per enemy. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!
${ModID}:Ping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card and gain 3 Vigor per enemy. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!

${ModID}:RacingThoughts.NAME: Racing Thoughts
${ModID}:RacingThoughts.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards NL Find a random 0 cost card from any class. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!

${ModID}:ReroutingAttack.NAME: Rerouting:Attack
${ModID}:ReroutingAttack.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Gain !M! Vigor for each enemy in combat. NL Discard 1 skill card at random.
${ModID}:ReroutingAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Gain !M! Vigor for each enemy in combat. NL Discard 1 skill card at random.

${ModID}:ReroutingBlock.NAME: Rerouting:Block
${ModID}:ReroutingBlock.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Gain !B! block for each enemy in combat. NL Discard 1 attack card at random.
${ModID}:ReroutingBlock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Gain !B! block for each enemy in combat. NL Discard 1 attack card at random.

${ModID}:Struggle.NAME: Struggle
${ModID}:Struggle.DESCRIPTION: Ran out of cards? Panic! NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:Supertaster.NAME: Supertaster
${ModID}:Supertaster.DESCRIPTION: The first buff and debuff on you each turn is increased by 1.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Temperance.NAME: Temperance
${ModID}:Temperance.DESCRIPTION: Choose one with Buff: Thrice deal !D! damage all enemies or thrice Gain !B! Block per card Exhausted. NL Exhaust
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all skills. NL Apply Strength and Attack All Thrice for !D! per Exhausted.
Exhaust all attacks. NL Apply Dexterity and Block Thrice for !B! per Exhausted.

${ModID}:TemperancePatient.NAME: Temperance:Patient
${ModID}:TemperancePatient.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Exhaust all attacks and curses in hand. NL Apply Dexterity and Block Thrice for !B! per Exhausted. NL Exhaust
${ModID}:TemperancePatient.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Exhaust all attacks and curses in hand. NL Apply Dexterity and Block Thrice for !B! per Exhausted.

${ModID}:TemperanceSpiteful.NAME: Temperance:Spiteful
${ModID}:TemperanceSpiteful.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Exhaust all skills in hand. NL Apply Strength and Attack All Thrice for !D! per Exhausted. NL Exhaust
${ModID}:TemperanceSpiteful.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Swappable NL Exhaust all skills in hand. NL Apply Strength and Attack All Thrice for !D! per Exhausted. NL NL

${ModID}:Traceroute.NAME: Traceroute
${ModID}:Traceroute.DESCRIPTION: Return a card from your exhaust pile to your hand. NL Exhaust
${ModID}:Traceroute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a card from your exhaust pile to your hand. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:ZeroPointOverdrive.NAME: Zero Point Overdrive
${ModID}:ZeroPointOverdrive.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your hand, draw pile, or both are empty. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL.
